effect_en: +1 card slot in shop
effect_zh: 商店 +1 卡槽

effect_en: +1 card slot in shop
effect_zh: 商店再 +1 卡槽

effect_en: All cards and packs in shop are 25% off
effect_zh: 商店所有卡牌和补充包 75折

effect_en: All cards and packs in shop are 50% off
effect_zh: 商店所有卡牌和补充包 5折

effect_en: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 2X more often
effect_zh: 闪箔、全息、多彩牌出现概率 ×2

effect_en: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 4X more often
effect_zh: 闪箔、全息、多彩牌出现概率 ×4

effect_en: Rerolls cost $2 less
effect_zh: 重掷费用 -$2

effect_en: Rerolls cost $2 less
effect_zh: 重掷费用再 -$2

effect_en: +1 consumable slot
effect_zh: +1 消耗品槽位

effect_en: Spectral cards may appear in any Arcana Pack
effect_zh: 幽灵牌可能出现在任何秘术包中

effect_en: Celestial Packs always contain the Planet card for your most played hand
effect_zh: 天体包总是包含你最常打出牌型的星球牌

effect_en: Planet cards in your consumable area give ×1.5 Mult for their poker hand
effect_zh: 消耗品区的星球牌为对应牌型 ×1.5 倍率

effect_en: +1 hand per round
effect_zh: 每回合 +1 出牌次数

effect_en: +1 hand per round
effect_zh: 每回合再 +1 出牌次数

effect_en: +1 discard per round
effect_zh: 每回合 +1 弃牌次数

effect_en: +1 discard per round
effect_zh: 每回合再 +1 弃牌次数

effect_en: Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $25
effect_zh: 每回合利息上限提高到 $25

effect_en: Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $50
effect_zh: 每回合利息上限提高到 $50

effect_en: Does nothing?
effect_zh: 什么都不做？

effect_en: +1 Joker slot
effect_zh: +1 小丑牌槽位

effect_en: Playing cards can be purchased from the shop
effect_zh: 可以从商店购买扑克牌

effect_en: Playing cards in shop may have an Enhancement, Edition, and/or a Seal
effect_zh: 商店中的扑克牌可能有增强、版本和/或封印

effect_en: -1 Ante, -1 hand per round
effect_zh: -1 关卡，每回合 -1 出牌次数

effect_en: -1 Ante, -1 discard per round
effect_zh: -1 关卡，每回合 -1 弃牌次数

effect_en: Reroll Boss Blind 1 time per Ante
effect_zh: 每个关卡可以重掷 Boss 盲注 1 次

effect_en: Reroll Boss Blind unlimited times, $10 each
effect_zh: 无限次重掷 Boss 盲注，每次 $10

effect_en: +1 hand size
effect_zh: 手牌上限 +1

effect_en: +1 hand size
effect_zh: 手牌上限再 +1

effect_en: Tarot cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
effect_zh: 塔罗牌在商店出现频率 ×2

effect_en: Tarot cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
effect_zh: 塔罗牌在商店出现频率 ×4

effect_en: Planet cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
effect_zh: 星球牌在商店出现频率 ×2

effect_en: Planet cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
effect_zh: 星球牌在商店出现频率 ×4
